argSrc: Anti-virus software protects the users of a computer from dangers from the internet.
argTrg: That's why everyone should have an anti-virus programme on his or her Windows machine.

argSrc: Anti-virus software protects the users of a computer from dangers from the internet.
argTrg: Admittedly they do not generally prevent you from catching a virus,

argSrc: Anti-virus software protects the users of a computer from dangers from the internet.
argTrg: since they can only react to publicly known threats.

argSrc: Anti-virus software protects the users of a computer from dangers from the internet.
argTrg: But once a safeguard has been found against a new virus, everyone gets it in no time through the automatic update.
